The minor version 3.44.0 of "Argo user's manual" was published on July 9th 2025.
It is available on [https://dx.doi.org/10.13155/29825](https://dx.doi.org/10.13155/29825){target="_blank"}

There is one change:

- ยง3.3.1, ยง3.25.1, ยง2.4.7.1 and ยง2.4.7.2 <br>This release includes the completion of rules to indicate multiple sensors. While the PARAMETER field was handled in release 3.43.0, the SENSOR field is now also covered (addressing ticket [https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/81](https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/81){target="_blank"}).
